mdRecord.dcterms:title: Barn Near Salem Destroyed by Fire
mdRecord.dcterms:description: News clipping about a barn that was destroyed in a fire, which reads "A barn in Roanoke County was destroyed by fire yesterday afternoon. The barn, just off Virginia 693 southeast of Salem, was the property of James W. Moore of Rt. 2, Salem. The fire was discovered about 4:30 p.m.", undated
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Fire departments
Virginia
mdRecord.dcterms:provenance: Virginia Polytechnic Institute and State University. University Libraries
